kbSuggestions.title: Poultry low-temperature safety note
kbSuggestions.suggestion: This recipe references low-temperature cooking for poultry. Ensure it includes safe time/temperature notes (e.g., 60Â°C for 2 hours for pasteurization) or use higher temperatures to guarantee safety.

kbSuggestions.title: Maillard note: dry surface for browning
kbSuggestions.suggestion: For better browning, pat proteins dry and avoid overcrowding the pan; use a hot pan and enough fat to reach Maillard temperatures.

kbSuggestions.title: Recommend tasting and seasoning
kbSuggestions.suggestion: Consider adding a step to taste and adjust seasoning (salt and acid) before serving.

kbSuggestions.title: Plating: add color or height when absent
kbSuggestions.suggestion: Consider a bright finishing garnish (herbs, citrus zest, pickles) or a crunchy element to add color and texture.
